messages.messageBody:
https://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com/2018/06/real-world-facist-pc-garbage-self.html

This was put up today—additions to three pages on my site.

That link will lead to “Random old news of new info” and give you a way to explore my site, and Just Add Light (because the photos are links to posts there).

Every day, still, I write about unschooling or work on my site, adding new quotes by someone, or me. :-)

If there are people here who need more unschooling input, ask questions here!
Or come to the less-elegant but much busier facebook group Radical Unschooling Info. You can read it without joining, if you have a facebook account.
https://www.facebook.com/groups/303347574750/

Sandra
